archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0749
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As business customer, when I am checking on the progress of an order, I want to be able to easily link to the MSA/Contract and any service agreements that I've signed that relates to the services in the order so that I know what it is have signed up for.

properties.value: Is MSA (aka Frame Agreement) for Base 1?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
